Desc.entry: A community agency for the development and regeneration, both social and economic, of black communities in Sheffield and South Yorkshire. Provides a youth service through the Lion Heart Project which is delivered by learning mentors and sessional workers. Aims to enable young people to make the best transition to adulthood and working life. Runs "Pathways" to training, skills enterprise and employability (all ages).

Langs.entry: Arabic, Bengali, Punjabi, Shona, Somali, Urdu
